review.title: “Great Place to Work”
review.pros: Pros – Great family environment. I love dealing with our clients. We supply wholesale fresh floral. floral supplies and gift ware products to retail businesses. We pride ourselves in providing a vast array of fresh flowers and greens to provide that one-stop shop for our clients.
review.cons: Cons – The commute to and from work is frustrating at times.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
